to have plenty of laughs at Piers Morgan and Simon Cowell 's expense but now they've been replaced with Michael McIntyre and David Hasselhoff . Ant McPartlin admitted BGT had changed without those two big egos to prick. He said: It has changed the mood of the show but, you know, it might be for the better.
